title: The Enchanted Garden
description: Discover magical flowers and friendly creatures in an enchanted garden!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒ¸ Welcome to the Enchanted Garden!
storySteps.text: Hello little explorer! I am Petal the magical flower, and I'm so happy you're here! Today, we're going on a special listening adventure through my enchanted garden. You will meet talking flowers, singing bees, and wise butterflies. Your mission is to listen very carefully to what they say, and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready? Let's begin our magical journey together!

storySteps.title: ğŸ Singing Bees
storySteps.audioText: We work together to make honey
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the bees are singing!
storySteps.question: What do the bees do together?
storySteps.hint: Think about what bees create when they work as a team

choices.text: We work together to make honey

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered something magical about our buzzing friends! When bees work together as a team, they create the most delicious golden honey that makes everyone smile. Just like these busy bees, when we help each other and work as a team, we can create something truly beautiful and special! Teamwork makes our world sweeter and brighter! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep listening carefully - there's so much more to discover in our enchanted garden!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒº Flower Friends
storySteps.audioText: We bloom together to make the garden beautiful
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the flowers are saying!
storySteps.question: How do flowers make the garden beautiful?
storySteps.hint: Think about what flowers do when they bloom

choices.text: We bloom together to make the garden beautiful

storySteps.revealText: How absolutely lovely! You've learned a beautiful secret from our garden friends! When flowers bloom together, they create a magnificent rainbow of colors that makes the entire garden come alive with beauty and joy. Each flower is like a friend, and when they all bloom together, they create something far more wonderful than any single flower could alone! This teaches us that teamwork and friendship create the most beautiful things in the world!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¦‹ Wise Butterfly
storySteps.audioText: Every flower has its own special color
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the butterfly's wisdom!
storySteps.question: What does the wise butterfly tell us about flowers?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes each flower unique

choices.text: Every flower has its own special color

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! The wise butterfly has shared a very important lesson with you! Every single flower in our garden is special and unique in its own wonderful way - some are bright pink, others are sunny yellow, and some are royal purple! Just like you, each flower has its own special color, its own special shape, and its own special way of bringing joy and happiness to everyone who sees it! This reminds us that being different and unique is what makes each of us special! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're doing so well!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒ¿ Garden Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: Nature teaches us to care for each other
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the garden's wisdom!
storySteps.question: What does nature teach us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what we learn from nature

choices.text: Nature teaches us to care for each other

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! Nature has so many wonderful lessons to teach us, and you've discovered one of the most important ones! When we look around our garden, we see flowers helping each other grow, bees working together, and all the creatures caring for one another. Nature shows us that when we care for each other and show kindness, we create a world full of love and happiness! Just like the garden takes care of all its creatures, we should take care of each other too!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒˆ Magical Rainbow
storySteps.audioText: Rainbows appear after the rain brings new life
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the rainbow's magical message!
storySteps.question: When do rainbows appear according to the garden?
storySteps.hint: Think about what happens after rain

choices.text: Rainbows appear after the rain brings new life

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire garden! You've learned something truly wonderful - rainbows appear after the rain, bringing new life, fresh colors, and hope to our garden! Just like how rain helps flowers grow, challenges in life help us grow stronger and wiser. The rainbow reminds us that after every storm, something beautiful and magical can appear! You are an absolutely AMAZING explorer! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how carefully you thought, and how bravely you explored! The whole garden is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Garden Magic
storySteps.text: The garden is filled with so much magic! All the flowers and creatures are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about working together, being unique, and finding beauty in nature!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Garden Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations superstar! The WHOLE garden is celebrating YOU! Flowers are dancing, bees are buzzing with joy, and magic sparkles everywhere! You made the garden happy with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: Dragon's Treasure
description: Help a friendly dragon protect its treasure from sneaky thieves!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to Dragon's Lair!
storySteps.text: Hello brave friend! I am Spark the friendly dragon, and I'm so excited you're here! Today, we'll protect my treasure together and learn about friendship and courage. You will meet wise guardians, magical keys, and discover what true treasure is. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready for this adventure?

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘‹ Dragon Greeting
storySteps.audioText: Friendship is more valuable than gold
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the dragon tells us!
storySteps.question: What is more valuable than gold?
storySteps.hint: Think about what dragons value most

choices.text: Friendship is more valuable than gold

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! Spark the dragon has shared a very important secret with you! While gold and jewels might sparkle and shine, true friendship is far more valuable and precious than any treasure chest could ever hold! A real friend who cares about you, helps you when you need it, and makes you laugh is worth more than all the gold in the world! True friends are the real treasure that lasts forever and makes our hearts happy!

storySteps.title: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Wise Guardian
storySteps.audioText: Protecting friends is the greatest honor
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the guardian's wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest honor according to the guardian?
storySteps.hint: Think about what guardians protect

choices.text: Protecting friends is the greatest honor

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! The wise guardian has taught you something very special! Protecting our friends and keeping them safe is one of the greatest honors we can have! When we care for others and stand up for what's right, we show true courage and bravery! It takes a brave heart to protect those we love, and that's what makes us true heroes! You've shown that you understand this important lesson! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep being brave and kind!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’ Dragon Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: True treasure is sharing happiness with others
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the dragon's wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is true treasure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes us truly happy

choices.text: True treasure is gold and jewels
True treasure is sharing happiness with others

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! You've discovered the secret of true treasure! The real treasure isn't gold or jewels that sit in a chest - it's sharing happiness, laughter, and joy with others! When we share our joy with friends and family, we create something truly magical that makes everyone feel wonderful! The more we share our happiness, the more happiness grows in the world! That's the kind of treasure that multiplies and never runs out!

storySteps.title: ğŸ”‘ Magical Keys
storySteps.audioText: Kindness opens all doors
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the magical keys tell us!
storySteps.question: What opens all doors?
storySteps.hint: Think about what helps us open doors
storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! The magical keys have revealed an incredible secret to you! Kindness is like a master key that can open any door in the world! When we are kind to others - when we smile, help someone, or say something nice - we unlock wonderful things like friendship, trust, and love! Kindness opens hearts, opens doors, and opens up amazing possibilities! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're becoming a true friend and protector!

storySteps.title: âš”ï¸ Dragon Courage
storySteps.audioText: Courage means standing up for what is right
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what courage means!
storySteps.question: What does courage mean?
storySteps.hint: Think about what brave people do

choices.text: Courage means standing up for what is right

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly brave! You've learned what true courage really means! Courage isn't about not being scared - it's about standing up for what is right even when it's hard! When we see something wrong and we speak up, when we help someone who needs it, or when we do the right thing even when it's difficult, that's when we show true bravery! Courage comes from our heart, and you've shown you have a very brave heart!

storySteps.title: ğŸ“¦ Treasure Chest
storySteps.audioText: The greatest treasure is friendship and love
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the treasure chest reveals!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest treasure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what is most valuable

choices.text: The greatest treasure is friendship and love

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire dragon's lair! You've discovered the greatest treasure of all - friendship and love! These are the treasures that never fade, never break, and never get lost! They grow stronger every day and make our lives full of joy and happiness! You are an absolutely AMAZING friend and protector! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how bravely you protected the treasure, and how wisely you learned about true friendship! The whole lair is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Dragon Magic
storySteps.text: The dragon's lair is filled with so much wonder! All the guardians are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about friendship, courage, and true treasure!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Dragon Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations brave friend! The WHOLE lair is celebrating YOU! Dragons are roaring with joy, treasure sparkles everywhere, and magic is all around! You protected the treasure with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Magic School
description: Learn spells and make new friends at the magical school!

storySteps.title: ğŸ“ Welcome to the Magic School!
storySteps.text: Hello young wizard! I am Professor Sparkle the magic teacher, and I'm so happy you're here! Today, we'll learn magical spells, make new friends, and discover the power of learning together. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to learn magic?

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘‹ School Greeting
storySteps.audioText: Learning together makes magic stronger
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the magic school teaches us!
storySteps.question: What makes magic stronger?
storySteps.hint: Think about learning with others
storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! Professor Sparkle has shared a magical secret with you! When we learn together with our friends, something amazing happens - our magic becomes much stronger and more powerful! It's like when friends help each other study, practice together, and share what they know - everyone becomes better! Learning alone is good, but learning together creates a special kind of magic that makes us all stronger!

storySteps.title: âœ¨ Spell Learning
storySteps.audioText: Practice makes our spells perfect
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what we learn about spells!
storySteps.question: What makes our spells perfect?
storySteps.hint: Think about how to get better at something
storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've learned one of the most important secrets of magic school! Practice is the key to making our spells perfect! Just like learning to ride a bike or play a game, the more we practice our spells, the better we get at them! Every time we try, we learn something new and get a little bit better! Practice might seem hard at first, but it's how we become amazing wizards! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep practicing!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘¥ Magic Friends
storySteps.audioText: Friends help us learn and grow
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what friends do for us!
storySteps.question: How do friends help us?
storySteps.hint: Think about how friends support each other

choices.text: Friends help us learn and grow

storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've discovered something wonderful about friendship at magic school! Friends don't just play together - they help us learn and grow in amazing ways! When we study with friends, they can explain things we don't understand, cheer us on when we're learning something hard, and celebrate with us when we succeed! Together, we become better wizards because we support each other and learn from each other!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’« Friendship Magic
storySteps.audioText: Friendship is the most powerful magic
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the most powerful magic!
storySteps.question: What is the most powerful magic?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes us strong

choices.text: Gold is the most powerful magic
Friendship is the most powerful magic

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly powerful! You've discovered the most amazing secret in all of magic school! Friendship is the most powerful magic of all! It's even stronger than the strongest spell! When we have true friends who believe in us, support us, and care about us, we can do anything we set our minds to! Friends give us courage, make us laugh, and help us when things are tough! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're becoming a wonderful wizard!

storySteps.title: ğŸ”® Spell Practice
storySteps.audioText: Trying our best is what matters most
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what matters most!
storySteps.question: What matters most?
storySteps.hint: Think about what is important

choices.text: Trying our best is what matters most

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! Professor Sparkle has taught you something very important! It's not about being perfect or never making mistakes - what matters most is trying our best! When we give something our best effort, even if we don't get it right the first time, we're learning and growing! Every time we try our best, we get a little bit better, and that's how we succeed! Trying hard shows we care, and that's what makes us great wizards!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Wisdom Teacher
storySteps.audioText: Learning and friendship make us wise and happy
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the teacher's final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What makes us wise and happy?
storySteps.hint: Think about what the teacher teaches

choices.text: Gold makes us wise and happy
Learning and friendship make us wise and happy

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire magic school! You've discovered the greatest secret of all - learning and friendship make us wise and happy! When we learn new things, our minds grow and we become smarter! When we have friends, our hearts grow and we become happier! Together, learning and friendship create the most wonderful life full of knowledge, joy, and love! You are an absolutely AMAZING student! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how carefully you learned, and how wonderfully you made friends! The whole school is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ School Magic
storySteps.text: The magic school is filled with so much wonder! All the students are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about magic, friendship, and learning together!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ School Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations student! The WHOLE school is celebrating YOU! Wizards are casting spells of joy, magic sparkles everywhere, and friendship is all around! You learned magic with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: Ocean Explorer
description: Dive deep into the ocean and meet amazing sea creatures!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŠ Welcome to the Deep Ocean!
storySteps.text: Hello brave explorer! I am Coral the friendly octopus, and I'm so excited you're joining me on this underwater adventure! Today, we'll dive deep into the ocean, meet colorful sea creatures, and discover amazing underwater secrets. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to dive in?

storySteps.title: ğŸ  Swimming Fish
storySteps.audioText: We swim together in schools
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the fish are doing!
storySteps.question: How do fish move in the ocean?
storySteps.hint: Think about how fish travel together

choices.text: We swim alone in the ocean

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered something amazing about our ocean friends! Fish swim together in schools - not like a building, but like a big group of friends! When fish swim together, they help protect each other from danger, find food together, and stay safe! Just like fish, when we stick together with our friends, we're stronger and safer! Friends look out for each other, and that's what makes schools of fish so special!

storySteps.title: ğŸª¸ Coral Reef
storySteps.audioText: Coral reefs are home to many sea creatures
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the coral reef tells us!
storySteps.question: What are coral reefs?
storySteps.hint: Think about what coral reefs provide for sea animals

choices.text: Coral reefs are home to many sea creatures

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered one of the ocean's most amazing places! Coral reefs are like magical underwater cities, bustling with life and color! They're home to thousands of sea creatures - colorful fish, playful seahorses, shy octopuses, and so many more! Just like a city has houses for people, coral reefs have homes for all kinds of ocean animals! They're like underwater gardens full of bright colors and amazing creatures! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep exploring!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¬ Dolphin Friends
storySteps.audioText: We love to play and jump
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the dolphins are doing!
storySteps.question: What do dolphins love to do?
storySteps.hint: Think about how dolphins move in the water

choices.text: We love to sleep all day
We love to play and jump

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've learned something wonderful about our dolphin friends! Dolphins absolutely love to play and jump out of the water, spinning and splashing with pure joy! They remind us that having fun and playing is so important for happiness! When we play, we laugh, we feel happy, and we make wonderful memories! Dolphins show us that life should be full of joy and fun moments! They're some of the most joyful creatures in the ocean!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‹ Whale Song
storySteps.audioText: We sing to communicate with friends far away
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the whale's beautiful song!
storySteps.question: Why do whales sing?
storySteps.hint: Think about how whales talk to each other

choices.text: We sing to communicate with friends far away

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! You've discovered the secret of whale songs! Whales sing these amazing, deep songs that travel for miles and miles through the ocean water! They use their songs to talk to friends who are very far away, to find each other, and to share messages! It's like they have their own special ocean language that only they understand! Their songs are so powerful they can travel across entire oceans! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're becoming a true ocean explorer!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¢ Sea Turtle
storySteps.audioText: We travel long distances to find our home
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the sea turtle tells us!
storySteps.question: What do sea turtles do?
storySteps.hint: Think about sea turtle journeys

choices.text: We stay in one place always
We travel long distances to find our home

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly determined! You've learned something amazing about sea turtles! These incredible creatures travel thousands of miles across the ocean to return to the exact same beach where they were born! They use the Earth's magnetic field, the stars, and their amazing memory to find their way home! This shows us that home is a very special place - it's where we feel safe, loved, and comfortable! Just like sea turtles, we all have a special place we call home!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’ Ocean Treasure
storySteps.audioText: The ocean's treasure is its amazing creatures and their friendship
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the ocean treasure reveals!
storySteps.question: What is the ocean's greatest treasure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes the ocean special

choices.text: The ocean's treasure is its amazing creatures and their friendship

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire ocean! You've discovered the ocean's greatest treasure - its amazing creatures and the beautiful friendships they share! From tiny colorful fish to giant gentle whales, every creature in the ocean is special and valuable! The way they help each other, play together, and care for each other shows us the true treasure of friendship! You are an absolutely AMAZING ocean explorer! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how carefully you learned about ocean life, and how bravely you explored the deep sea! The whole ocean is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Ocean Magic
storySteps.text: The ocean is filled with so much wonder! All the sea creatures are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about ocean life, friendship, and the beauty of the deep sea!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Ocean Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations explorer! The WHOLE ocean is celebrating YOU! Fish are dancing, whales are singing, and magic sparkles everywhere! You explored the ocean with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Time Machine
description: Travel through time and visit different eras with your time machine!

storySteps.title: â° Welcome to the Time Machine!
storySteps.text: Hello time traveler! I am Tick the time machine, and I'm thrilled you're joining me on this incredible journey through time! Today, we'll visit the past, explore the present, and peek into the future. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to travel through time?

storySteps.title: ğŸš€ Time Travel
storySteps.audioText: Time travel lets us learn from history
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what time travel teaches us!
storySteps.question: What does time travel help us do?
storySteps.hint: Think about what we can learn from the past

choices.text: Time travel is just for fun
Time travel lets us learn from history

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered the amazing power of time travel! When we travel through time, we get to see how things were in the past, how they are now, and how they might be in the future! History is like a giant storybook full of lessons - we can learn from the mistakes and successes of people who lived long ago! Time travel helps us understand how our world has changed and how we can make the future even better!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¦• Dinosaur Era
storySteps.audioText: Dinosaurs were amazing creatures that lived long ago
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what we learn about dinosaurs!
storySteps.question: What were dinosaurs?
storySteps.hint: Think about when dinosaurs lived

choices.text: Dinosaurs were amazing creatures that lived long ago

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've traveled back to a time when incredible dinosaurs roamed the Earth! These magnificent creatures lived millions and millions of years ago - long before humans existed! Some dinosaurs were as small as chickens, while others were taller than buildings! By studying their fossils and learning about them, we can understand how life on Earth has changed over time! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Time travel is amazing!

storySteps.title: ğŸ›ï¸ Ancient Civilization
storySteps.audioText: Ancient people built amazing things together
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what ancient civilizations teach us!
storySteps.question: What did ancient people do?
storySteps.hint: Think about what ancient civilizations created

choices.text: Ancient people built amazing things together

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly inspiring! You've witnessed the incredible achievements of ancient civilizations! Long ago, people worked together to build amazing things like pyramids, temples, and cities that still stand today! They didn't have modern machines - they used their hands, their minds, and most importantly, teamwork! This shows us that when people work together and help each other, they can create truly amazing things that last for thousands of years! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­

storySteps.title: ğŸŒ Present Day
storySteps.audioText: Today we can learn from both past and future
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what today teaches us!
storySteps.question: What can we learn today?
storySteps.hint: Think about learning from different times

choices.text: Today we can learn from both past and future

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered something very wise! Today, right now, we have an amazing opportunity - we can learn from both the past and think about the future! From the past, we learn what worked and what didn't work, what made people happy and what caused problems! From thinking about the future, we can plan and dream about making the world better! When we combine lessons from the past with hopes for the future, we become much wiser!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Future Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: The future belongs to those who learn and care
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the future's important message!
storySteps.question: Who does the future belong to?
storySteps.hint: Think about what creates a good future

choices.text: The future belongs to no one
The future belongs to those who learn and care

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up all of time itself! You've discovered the secret of the future - it belongs to those who learn and care! When we learn new things, we grow smarter and can solve problems! When we care about others, we make the world a kinder and happier place! Together, learning and caring create a bright, wonderful future for everyone! You are an absolutely AMAZING time traveler! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how carefully you learned from history, and how wisely you thought about the future! All of time is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Time Magic
storySteps.text: Time travel is filled with so much wonder! All the eras are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about history, the present, and the future!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Time Travel Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations time traveler! The WHOLE timeline is celebrating YOU! Past, present, and future are all happy, and magic sparkles everywhere! You traveled through time with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Friendly Robot
description: Meet a helpful robot who wants to learn about friendship!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¤– Welcome to Robot World!
storySteps.text: Hello friend! I am Beep the friendly robot, and I'm so happy you're here! I want to learn about friendship and how to be a good friend. Today, we'll explore together, learn about kindness, and discover what makes friendship special. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to be my friend?

storySteps.title: ğŸ› ï¸ Robot Help
storySteps.audioText: I love to help others
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the robot loves to do!
storySteps.question: What does the robot love?
storySteps.hint: Think about what robots can do for others
storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! Beep the robot has shared something special with you! Robots are designed to help people, and Beep loves nothing more than helping others! When we help someone - whether it's picking up something they dropped, sharing our toys, or just being kind - we're showing them that we care about them! Helping others is one of the best ways to show friendship and make the world a better place!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘‹ Robot Greeting
storySteps.audioText: Friendship starts with a friendly hello
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to how friendship begins!
storySteps.question: How does friendship start?
storySteps.hint: Think about the first thing friends do

choices.text: Friendship starts with a friendly hello

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've learned how every great friendship begins! It all starts with something simple but powerful - a friendly hello! When we smile at someone, say hello, or wave, we're opening the door to friendship! A simple greeting shows that we're friendly and that we want to be friends! Every amazing friendship in the world started with someone saying hello! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep being friendly!

storySteps.title: ğŸ Robot Sharing
storySteps.audioText: Sharing makes friendship stronger
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what sharing does!
storySteps.question: What makes friendship stronger?
storySteps.hint: Think about what friends do together
storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've discovered one of the secrets of strong friendships! When we share with our friends - whether it's sharing our toys, our snacks, our time, or our ideas - we're showing them that we care about them! Sharing makes friendships grow stronger because it shows trust and kindness! The more we share, the closer our friendships become! It's like friendship glue that holds friends together!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’« Friendship Learning
storySteps.audioText: Friends help each other learn and grow
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what friends do for each other!
storySteps.question: How do friends help each other?
storySteps.hint: Think about how friends support each other

choices.text: Friends help each other learn and grow

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've learned something wonderful about how friends help each other! Friends don't just play together - they help each other learn new things and grow as people! When we learn with friends, they can teach us things we don't know, encourage us when something is hard, and celebrate with us when we succeed! Together, friends help each other become better, smarter, and happier! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're becoming a great friend!

storySteps.title: â¤ï¸ Robot Caring
storySteps.audioText: Caring about others is what makes us friends
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what makes true friendship!
storySteps.question: What makes true friendship?
storySteps.hint: Think about what friends feel for each other

choices.text: Caring about others is what makes us friends

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! You've discovered the heart of true friendship! Caring about others - really caring about how they feel, what they need, and what makes them happy - is what makes us true friends! When we care about someone, we think about them, we help them when they need it, and we want them to be happy! This caring creates special bonds between friends that are strong and lasting! Caring is what turns someone from just a person we know into a real friend!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Robot Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: True friendship is about being kind and helpful to everyone
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the robot's final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is true friendship?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes friendship real

choices.text: True friendship is only for robots
True friendship is about being kind and helpful to everyone

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire robot world! You've discovered the greatest secret of all - true friendship is about being kind and helpful to everyone, not just some people! When we're kind to everyone we meet, when we help others without expecting anything back, and when we treat everyone with respect, we become truly great friends! That's the secret to being a friend that everyone loves and trusts! You are an absolutely AMAZING friend! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how kindly you learned about friendship, and how wonderfully you became Beep's friend! The whole robot world is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Robot Magic
storySteps.text: Robot world is filled with so much friendship! All the robots are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about friendship, kindness, and being a good friend!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Robot Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations friend! The WHOLE robot world is celebrating YOU! Robots are beeping with joy, friendship sparkles everywhere, and magic is all around! You learned about friendship with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Secret Cave
description: Explore a mysterious cave filled with glowing crystals and hidden treasures!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’ Welcome to the Secret Cave!
storySteps.text: Hello brave explorer! I am Crystal the cave guide, and I'm so excited you're joining me on this mysterious adventure! Today, we'll explore a secret cave, discover glowing crystals, and find hidden treasures. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to explore the cave?

storySteps.title: ğŸ•³ï¸ Cave Entrance
storySteps.audioText: The cave entrance is mysterious and exciting
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the cave entrance tells us!
storySteps.question: What is the cave entrance like?
storySteps.hint: Think about how caves look from the outside

choices.text: The cave entrance is mysterious and exciting

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered the entrance to a secret cave full of mystery and excitement! The cave entrance looks dark and mysterious from the outside, but it's actually full of amazing adventures waiting to be explored! Just like when we try something new or go somewhere we've never been before, it might seem a little scary at first, but inside there are wonderful discoveries and magical moments waiting for us!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’ Glowing Crystals
storySteps.audioText: Crystals glow with the light of wonder and discovery
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the glowing crystals tell us!
storySteps.question: What do the crystals glow with?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes crystals special

choices.text: Crystals glow with the light of wonder and discovery

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've discovered the magical glowing crystals deep in the cave! These beautiful crystals glow with a special light that comes from wonder and discovery! They sparkle and shine, showing us that when we explore new places and try new things, we can find beautiful and amazing things we never knew existed! The crystals remind us that being curious and exploring can lead us to discover wonderful treasures! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep exploring!

storySteps.title: ğŸ›¤ï¸ Cave Path
storySteps.audioText: Every path leads to new discoveries
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the cave path teaches us!
storySteps.question: What do paths lead to?
storySteps.hint: Think about what happens when we follow paths

choices.text: Every path leads to new discoveries

storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've learned something wonderful about exploring! Every path we take, whether it's a path in a cave, a path in life, or a path of learning, leads us to new discoveries! When we're brave enough to follow a path and see where it goes, we often find amazing things we never expected! Some paths lead to beautiful crystals, others lead to new friends, and some lead to new knowledge! The important thing is to keep exploring!

storySteps.title: ğŸ“¦ Cave Treasure
storySteps.audioText: The cave's treasure is the joy of exploration
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the cave treasure reveals!
storySteps.question: What is the cave's treasure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes exploration special

choices.text: The cave's treasure is the joy of exploration

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered the cave's greatest treasure, and it's not gold or jewels! The real treasure is the joy of exploration itself - the excitement of discovering new things, the wonder of seeing something for the first time, and the happiness that comes from learning! When we explore and discover new things, we're finding treasures that make us smarter, happier, and more curious! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­ You're a true explorer!

storySteps.title: ğŸª¨ Cave Walls
storySteps.audioText: The walls tell stories of ancient times
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the cave walls tell us!
storySteps.question: What do the cave walls tell?
storySteps.hint: Think about what walls can show us

choices.text: The walls tell stories of ancient times

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly fascinating! You've discovered that the cave walls are like ancient storybooks! The walls have drawings, marks, and patterns that tell stories from long, long ago - stories about people who lived thousands of years before us! These ancient stories show us how people lived, what they thought was important, and what they discovered! The walls remind us that history is all around us, and we can learn so much from the past!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Cave Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: The greatest treasure is the courage to explore and learn
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the cave's final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest treasure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes exploration possible

choices.text: The greatest treasure is the courage to explore and learn

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire secret cave! You've discovered the greatest treasure of all - the courage to explore and learn! This treasure is more valuable than any gold because it's what makes us grow, learn, and become better people! When we have the courage to explore new places, try new things, and learn new ideas, we're finding the treasure that helps us become amazing! You are an absolutely AMAZING explorer! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how bravely you explored the cave, and how wisely you learned about discovery! The whole cave is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Cave Magic
storySteps.text: The cave is filled with so much wonder! All the crystals are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about exploration, discovery, and the joy of learning!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Cave Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations explorer! The WHOLE cave is celebrating YOU! Crystals are glowing with joy, treasures sparkle everywhere, and magic is all around! You explored the cave with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Flying Carpet
description: Soar through the skies on a magical flying carpet adventure!

storySteps.title: ğŸª¶ Welcome to the Flying Carpet!
storySteps.text: Hello sky traveler! I am Zephyr the flying carpet, and I'm so excited you're joining me on this amazing sky adventure! Today, we'll soar through the clouds, visit star kingdoms, and discover the magic of the sky. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to fly?

storySteps.title: ğŸš€ Flying Start
storySteps.audioText: Flying teaches us to see the world from above
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what flying teaches us!
storySteps.question: What does flying teach us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what we see when we fly

choices.text: Flying teaches us to see the world from above

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered something amazing about flying! When we fly high up in the sky, we get to see the world from a completely different perspective - everything looks smaller, we can see how things connect, and we notice things we never saw from the ground! Flying teaches us that sometimes we need to step back or look at things from a different angle to really understand them! It's like getting a bird's-eye view of life!

storySteps.title: â˜ï¸ Cloud Adventure
storySteps.audioText: Clouds are like soft pillows in the sky
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the clouds tell us!
storySteps.question: What are clouds like?
storySteps.hint: Think about how clouds feel

choices.text: Clouds are like soft pillows in the sky

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've discovered what clouds are really like up close! When we fly through the clouds, they feel like the softest, fluffiest pillows you can imagine - like floating through a giant cotton ball! Clouds are made of tiny water droplets that are so light they float in the sky! They're not solid like the ground, but they're not empty either - they're like magical, fluffy pillows that we can fly through! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep flying!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¦ Bird Friends
storySteps.audioText: Birds fly together to stay safe
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the birds tell us!
storySteps.question: Why do birds fly together?
storySteps.hint: Think about why birds stay in groups

choices.text: Birds fly together to stay safe

storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've learned something wonderful about our bird friends! Birds fly together in groups called flocks, and they do this to stay safe! When birds fly together, they can watch out for each other, warn each other about danger, and help each other find food! Just like birds, when we work together with our friends and family, we protect each other and keep each other safe! There's safety and strength in numbers!

storySteps.title: â­ Star Navigation
storySteps.audioText: Stars guide us when we're lost
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the stars tell us!
storySteps.question: What do stars do?
storySteps.hint: Think about how stars help travelers

choices.text: Stars guide us when we're lost

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered the secret of the stars! For thousands of years, stars have been like a map in the sky, guiding travelers when they're lost! Sailors used stars to find their way across oceans, explorers used them to navigate through deserts, and even today, stars help us know which direction we're going! But stars do more than just guide us - they also give us hope and remind us that even in the darkest night, there's always light! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŒ Sky Journey
storySteps.audioText: Every journey teaches us something new
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what journeys teach us!
storySteps.question: What do journeys teach us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what we learn from traveling

choices.text: Every journey teaches us something new

storySteps.revealText: How beautiful! You've learned something wonderful about journeys! Every journey we take - whether it's a journey through the sky, a journey to a new place, or a journey of learning - teaches us something new and important! When we explore and go on adventures, we discover new things about the world and about ourselves! Each journey makes us a little bit wiser, a little bit braver, and a little bit more curious! That's the magic of exploring!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Sky Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: The sky reminds us that anything is possible when we believe
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the sky's final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What does the sky remind us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what the sky shows us

choices.text: The sky reminds us of nothing
The sky reminds us that anything is possible when we believe

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire sky! You've discovered the sky's greatest secret - anything is possible when we believe! The sky stretches out forever, full of possibilities, dreams, and adventures! When we believe in ourselves and our dreams, we can fly higher, reach further, and achieve things we never thought possible! That's the true magic of dreams - they give us the power to soar! You are an absolutely AMAZING sky traveler! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how bravely you flew through the clouds, and how wisely you learned about the sky! The whole sky is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Sky Magic
storySteps.text: The sky is filled with so much wonder! All the clouds and stars are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about flying, exploration, and the magic of dreams!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Sky Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations sky traveler! The WHOLE sky is celebrating YOU! Clouds are dancing, stars are twinkling with joy, and magic sparkles everywhere! You flew through the sky with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Lost Kingdom
description: Discover a hidden kingdom filled with ancient secrets and magical creatures!

storySteps.title: ğŸ° Welcome to the Lost Kingdom!
storySteps.text: Hello brave explorer! I am Sage the royal guide, and I'm so excited you're joining me on this incredible adventure! Today, we'll discover a hidden kingdom, unlock ancient secrets, and meet magical creatures. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready to explore the lost kingdom?

storySteps.title: ğŸšª Kingdom Entrance
storySteps.audioText: The kingdom gates welcome all who seek knowledge
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the kingdom gates tell us!
storySteps.question: Who do the kingdom gates welcome?
storySteps.hint: Think about what the gates are for

choices.text: The kingdom gates welcome all who seek knowledge

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've discovered something special about the kingdom gates! These magnificent gates don't care about how rich you are or where you come from - they welcome everyone who wants to learn and seek knowledge! The gates remind us that learning is for everyone, and when we want to learn something new, doors open for us! Knowledge is like a key that unlocks amazing possibilities and adventures!

storySteps.title: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Ancient Gates
storySteps.audioText: Ancient gates hold the wisdom of the past
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the ancient gates tell us!
storySteps.question: What do ancient gates hold?
storySteps.hint: Think about what gates protect

choices.text: Ancient gates hold the wisdom of the past

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've discovered what the ancient gates protect! These gates are like guardians of wisdom, holding all the knowledge and lessons from the past! They protect stories about how people lived long ago, what they learned, and what they discovered! The gates remind us that history is valuable and that we can learn so much from people who lived before us! Their wisdom helps us make better decisions today! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep seeking wisdom!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¦„ Magical Creatures
storySteps.audioText: Magical creatures teach us about wonder and kindness
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the magical creatures tell us!
storySteps.question: What do magical creatures teach us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what magical creatures show us

choices.text: Magical creatures teach us about wonder and kindness

storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've met the magical creatures of the lost kingdom! These wonderful creatures - unicorns, fairies, dragons, and more - teach us two very important things! First, they show us that the world is full of wonder and magic if we just look for it! Second, they teach us about kindness - magical creatures are kind to each other and to visitors, showing us that kindness makes the world a more magical place!

storySteps.title: ğŸ”® Kingdom Secrets
storySteps.audioText: The kingdom's secret is that friendship makes everything stronger
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the kingdom secrets reveal!
storySteps.question: What is the kingdom's secret?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes things stronger

choices.text: The kingdom's secret is that friendship makes everything stronger

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered the lost kingdom's greatest secret! The secret isn't about gold or power - it's that friendship makes everything stronger! When we have true friends who support us, believe in us, and help us, we become stronger, braver, and more capable! Friends help us solve problems, celebrate our successes, and comfort us when things are hard! With friends by our side, we can accomplish anything! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘‘ Royal Hall
storySteps.audioText: The royal hall celebrates those who help others
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the royal hall teaches us!
storySteps.question: Who does the royal hall celebrate?
storySteps.hint: Think about what is honored

choices.text: The royal hall celebrates no one
The royal hall celebrates those who help others

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly inspiring! You've discovered what the royal hall truly honors! The most beautiful and important hall in the kingdom doesn't celebrate people who have the most gold or the biggest castle - it celebrates those who help others! The hall honors people who are kind, who share what they have, and who make the world a better place! This teaches us that helping others is the greatest honor we can have - even greater than being a king or queen!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Royal Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: The greatest kingdom is built on love, friendship, and kindness
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the royal final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest kingdom built on?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes a kingdom great

choices.text: The greatest kingdom is built on gold
The greatest kingdom is built on love, friendship, and kindness

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire lost kingdom! You've discovered the secret of building the greatest kingdom - it's built on love, friendship, and kindness! These aren't just nice words - they're the strong foundation that holds everything together! When a kingdom (or a family, or a school, or any group) is built on love, friendship, and kindness, it becomes a wonderful place where everyone feels safe, happy, and valued! You are an absolutely AMAZING explorer! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how bravely you explored the kingdom, and how wisely you learned about building wonderful things! The whole kingdom is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Kingdom Magic
storySteps.text: The lost kingdom is filled with so much wonder! All the creatures are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about wisdom, friendship, and building wonderful things together!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Kingdom Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations explorer! The WHOLE kingdom is celebrating YOU! Royal guards are cheering, magical creatures are dancing with joy, and sparkles are everywhere! You discovered the lost kingdom with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: The Grand Adventure
description: Embark on the ultimate adventure combining all the magic you've learned!

storySteps.title: ğŸª Welcome to the Grand Adventure!
storySteps.text: Hello champion! I am Quest the adventure guide, and I'm thrilled you're joining me on this amazing grand adventure! Today, we'll use all the magic you've learned, meet friends from all adventures, and discover the greatest secret of all. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready for the grand adventure?

storySteps.title: ğŸ‘¥ Adventure Gathering
storySteps.audioText: All adventures begin with friends by our side
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what adventures begin with!
storySteps.question: What do all adventures begin with?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes adventures special

choices.text: All adventures begin with friends by our side

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely wonderful! You've learned the secret of how every great adventure starts! All the best adventures in the world begin with friends by our side! Friends make adventures more fun, more exciting, and more meaningful! When we have friends to share our adventures with, we laugh more, we're braver, and we create memories that last forever! Friends turn ordinary trips into extraordinary adventures!

storySteps.title: ğŸš€ Adventure Start
storySteps.audioText: Every adventure teaches us something new about ourselves
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what adventures teach us!
storySteps.question: What do adventures teach us?
storySteps.hint: Think about what we discover during adventures

choices.text: Every adventure teaches us something new about ourselves

storySteps.revealText: Simply amazing! You've discovered one of the most wonderful things about adventures! Every adventure we go on - whether it's exploring a new place, trying something new, or learning something difficult - teaches us something new about ourselves! We might discover that we're braver than we thought, that we're good at something we never tried, or that we can overcome challenges we were afraid of! Adventures help us grow and become the best version of ourselves! You've earned your first magical star! â­ Keep adventuring!

storySteps.title: âœ¨ Magic Lessons
storySteps.audioText: All the magic we've learned helps us help others
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what magic helps us do!
storySteps.question: What does magic help us do?
storySteps.hint: Think about how we use what we learn

choices.text: All the magic we've learned helps us help others

storySteps.revealText: How lovely! You've discovered the true purpose of all the magic we've learned! The magic isn't just for us to keep to ourselves - it's meant to help others! When we share what we've learned, when we teach others, and when we use our knowledge to help people, we're creating even more magic in the world! The more we share, the more magic grows! It's like a magic that multiplies when we give it away!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’« Friendship Quest
storySteps.audioText: Friendship is the greatest magic of all
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the greatest magic!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest magic?
storySteps.hint: Think about what is most powerful

choices.text: Friendship is the greatest magic of all

storySteps.revealText: Absolutely perfect! You've discovered the most powerful magic in the entire universe! Friendship is the greatest magic of all - even stronger than any spell, potion, or magical power! When we have true friends, we can do things we never thought possible! Friends give us courage when we're scared, make us laugh when we're sad, and help us when we need it! Friendship makes everything in life better and more magical! You've earned your second magical star! â­â­

storySteps.title: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Adventure Challenges
storySteps.audioText: Challenges make us stronger when we face them together
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what challenges do!
storySteps.question: What do challenges do?
storySteps.hint: Think about what happens when we face challenges

choices.text: Challenges make us stronger when we face them together

storySteps.revealText: Incredibly powerful! You've learned something very important about challenges! Challenges might seem scary or difficult, but when we face them together with friends and family, they actually make us stronger! When we work as a team, we can share ideas, help each other, and encourage each other to keep going! Together, we can overcome challenges that would be too hard for one person alone! That's the power of teamwork!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Grand Wisdom
storySteps.audioText: The greatest adventure is living life with love, friendship, and kindness
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the grand final wisdom!
storySteps.question: What is the greatest adventure?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes life wonderful

choices.text: The greatest adventure is finding gold
The greatest adventure is living life with love, friendship, and kindness

storySteps.revealText: WE DID IT! YES! All three magical stars are glowing so brightly they're lighting up the entire universe! You've discovered the secret of the greatest adventure of all - living life with love, friendship, and kindness! This isn't just about going on trips or exploring places - it's about how we live every single day! When we fill our lives with love for others, friendship with those around us, and kindness to everyone we meet, we're living the most wonderful adventure possible! You are an absolutely AMAZING champion! I'm so incredibly proud of how hard you listened, how bravely you faced challenges, and how wisely you learned about the greatest adventure of all! The whole universe is celebrating you!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Grand Magic
storySteps.text: The grand adventure is filled with so much wonder! All the friends from all adventures are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about friendship, courage, and living a wonderful life!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Grand Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations champion! The WHOLE universe is celebrating YOU! All adventures are cheering, magic sparkles everywhere, and friendship is all around! You completed the grand adventure with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!
